name: Intrinsic Alchemy Asset
summary: Learn about .IGZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Intrinsic Alchemy Engine is a 3D game development platform that was created by Intrinsic Graphics and is now owned by Activision. In the late 2010s, games produced using the Intrinsic Alchemy Engine, including Crash Bandicoot N. Sane Trilogy, Crash Team Racing Nitro-Fueled, and Skylanders Imaginators, began using IGZ-based game assets. IGZ files are stored within .PAK files.
NOTE: Some IGZ files contain in-game audio. You can play the audio contained within these files by renaming them to use the .WAV extension.

instructions: Players looking to modify IGZ models and textures can do so using a number of player-created modding utilities, including Alchemist, IgzModelConverter, and NST Texture Converter.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
